page.title: 13THE WOMEN'S INSTITUTE
page.content: The Women's Institute meets monthly in Hatch Beauchamp village hall. Recent speakers have covered topics such as environmental health,cooking for Royalty,farming in Hungary and home_made music. The residential Denman College covers an even wider range of subjects. There are group and county outings and skittles and Scrabble tournaments. The W.I.provides teas for the annual Flower Show, helps at the Bath and West Show and provides entertainment for the Village Christmas Supper. Members also make cakes and grow plants for sale at the W.I. shop in Taunton.
